summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Seventy-third Street, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest; Eli Avenue Northwest, from West Seventieth Street to West Seventy-third Street; and Thirteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Seventy-third Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein, together with all necessary cross walks and surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1597 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
